events.title: DSC S25 Intro Social
events.description: Join us for our Spring 2025 intro social! Meet the board, learn about upcoming events, and connect with fellow data science enthusiasts.

events.title: Career Workshop
events.description: Get tips on resume building, interview preparation, and navigating the data science job market.

events.title: Data Cleaning Workshop
events.description: Learn how to clean and prepare data for analysis using Python and Pandas.

events.title: Breaking into ML Research - Maxwell Jones
events.description: Learn about how to break into machine learning research and what it takes to succeed in the field from Maxwell Jones, a CMU PhD student.

events.title: MLOps in Industry: Naval Katoch, PPG
events.description: Naval Katoch, Machine Learning Operations Lead at PPG Industries, shared valuable insights from his 6+ years driving AI initiatives in manufacturing and optimization during our recent talk, drawing on his experience as a CMU graduate.

events.title: Inside Deep Research: Zhiqing Sun, OpenAI
events.description: Zhiqing Sun, Research Lead of OpenAI's Deep Research project and CMU PhD graduate, recently shared insights on agentic AI systems and the future of AI alignment, drawing from his expertise in enhancing AI reliability through minimal supervision and his insights from his PhD research.

events.title: Building the Future of the Terminal: Ian Hodge, Warp
events.description: Ian Hodge, an early engineer at terminal startup Warp, demonstrated the company's AI-powered command-line experience and shared insights from his journey from Facebook to watching Warp grow from a small team to a mid-stage startup, offering advice on career decisions and explaining the technical details behind their recently launched AI terminal assistant.

events.title: Monte Carlo Workshop
events.description: Learn how to use Monte Carlo simulations to model complex systems and make informed decisions for the upcoming PokerAI competition!

events.title: Poker/Game Theory Workshop
events.description: Learn the basics of poker, game theory, and tips on where to start building your PokerAI bot!
